FALEMOS.CameraEffectNotes: Effect to be applied to the video
FALEMOS.OverlayOffsetNotes: Overlay offsets for Bottom, Up, Left and Right sides
FALEMOS.CameraGeometryNotes: Geometry to be applied to the video
FALEMOS.CameraNameColorNotes: Set the colour, position and size of the banner
FALEMOS.SceneFitNotes: Fit the scene so that the image covers the entire scene or so that the image is seen in its entirety.
FALEMOS.ExportConfigToMacroNotes: Saves the saved settings of this scene in a macro, when used it sets the same settings in the visible scene. Used to make scene templates (Ex: '3 large vertical cameras - scifi')..
FALEMOS.vaccinator.title: Falemos' autoconfig parameters
FALEMOS.vaccinator.marginsHint: Space in pixels to leave at left/top/right/bottom of the cameras layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.rowsHint: Number de rows of the cameras layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.columnsHint: Number de columns of the cameras layout
FALEMOS.vaccinator.separationHint: Minimum separation between too consecutive cameras
FALEMOS.vaccinator.gmpositionHint: Where to allocate GM, numbered from 1 to rows*columns. Position (2,2) of a 2x3 composition is 5
FALEMOS.vaccinator.emptyslotsHint: Empty slots where no cameras are allocated (comma separators), numbered from 1 to rows*columns
FALEMOS.vaccinator.framesHint: Image over the cameras. Multiple selection; if there is only one image, it will be used for all users, in there are multiple images (comma separators) it will be assigned to users in order
FALEMOS.vaccinator.overlaysHint: Percentage the frame is extended to the left/top/right/bottom beyond camera limits
